level.heading: Reporting requirements.
level.text: By July 15 of each year, beginning in 2014, the Office of the Attorney General shall submit to the Mayor and the Secretary to the Council a truancy status report on the preceding school year, which shall include the number of:
Referrals it received from each educational institution;
Cases it filed pursuant to this subchapter, and the outcome of each;
Child-in-need of supervision cases filed pursuant to this subchapter, and the outcome of each; and
Students who were enrolled in a court diversion program, or other diversion program pursuant to this subchapter.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 20-17 added this section.
